recipe.title: Honey Mustard Salad Dressing Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; stone ground mustard ; (60 g)
freshly ground black pepper, to taste
1 cup ; extra virgin olive oil ; (235 mL)
½ cup ; apple cider vinegar ; (120 mL)

steps.step: Add the ingredients into a mason jar. Screw the lid on tightly and shake vigorously.
The dressing can remain in the fridge for 1–2 weeks.
Pour over your favorite salad ingredients and enjoy!
